hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="drupal" published_version="8.4.4"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- export WORK_DIR=`pwd` export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y tar wget curl libjpeg8-devel libpng-devel curl-devel cronie openssh libicu-devel pkg-config patch \ libxslt-devel gcc-c++ cmake mariadb libmysqld-devel apache2 apache2-devel libmcrypt libmcrypt-devel net-tools
###Create Drupal database sudo /usr/bin/mysql_install_db --user=mysql sleep 15s sudo mkdir -p /var/log/mysql sudo sed -i '701s/hostname/echo $HOSTNAME/' /usr/bin/mysqld_safe sudo /usr/bin/mysqld_safe --user=mysql & sleep 20s sudo mysql -e "create database drupal" sudo mysql -e "create user 'drupal'@'localhost' identified by 'drupal'" sudo mysql -e "grant all privileges on drupal.* to 'drupal'@'localhost' identified by 'drupal' with GRANT OPTION"
###Install PHP cd $WORK_DIR sudo rm -rf php-7.0.23 wget http://www.php.net/distributions/php-7.0.23.tar.gz tar xvzf php-7.0.23.tar.gz cd php-7.0.23 ./configure --with-apxs2=/usr/bin/apxs2 --without-pcre-jit --with-openssl --enable-soap --with-libxml-dir=/usr/lib64 --with-mysqli --with-gd --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/jpeglib.h --with-png-dir --with-pdo_mysql --with-curl --with-mcrypt --enable-mbstring --enable-intl --enable-zip --with-xsl make sudo make install sudo cp ./php.ini-development /usr/local/php/php.ini export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/php/bin:/usr/local/bin/php:/usr/local/lib/php:/usr/local/php /usr/local/bin/php -v
###Install Composer cd $WORK_DIR
curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | /usr/local/bin/php sudo mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin/ composer -V
#Modify apache config files line1="Options None" line2="Options Indexes FollowSymLinks" line3="AllowOverride None" line4="AllowOverride All"
###Modify the configuration files sudo chmod 766 /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo cp /etc/apache2/httpd.conf /etc/apache2/httpd.conf.old sudo cp /etc/apache2/default-server.conf /etc/apache2/default-server.conf.old sudo echo -e "ServerName localhost" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "AddType application/x-httpd-php .php" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "AddHandler cgi-script .cgi" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "<Directory />" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "DirectoryIndex index.php index.html index.var" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "</Directory>" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "LoadModule php7_module /usr/lib64/apache2/libphp7.so" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "LoadModule rewrite_module /usr/lib64/apache2/mod_rewrite.so" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "DocumentRoot /srv/www/htdocs" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "<Directory /srv/www/htdocs>" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "Options Indexes FollowSymLinks" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "AllowOverride all" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "Require all granted" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo echo -e "</Directory>" >> /etc/apache2/httpd.conf sudo sed -i '207d' /etc/apache2/httpd.conf
sudo sed -i "s/$line1/$line2/g" /etc/apache2/default-server.conf sudo sed -i "s/$line3/$line4/g" /etc/apache2/default-server.conf
sudo a2enmod rewrite sudo a2enmod php
##download Drupal source cd $WORK_DIR wget https://ftp.drupal.org/files/projects/drupal-8.4.4.tar.gz tar -zxvf drupal-8.4.4.tar.gz sudo mkdir -p /srv/www/htdocs/Drupal cd drupal-8.4.4 sudo mv * .htaccess .csslintrc .editorconfig .eslintignore .eslintrc.json .gitattributes /srv/www/htdocs/Drupal/ cd /srv/www/htdocs/Drupal composer install
#Set permissions sudo mkdir sites/default/files sudo chmod a+w sites/default/files sudo chmod a+w sites/default sudo cp sites/default/default.settings.php sites/default/settings.php sudo chmod a+w sites/default/settings.php sudo cp /home/test/work/Drupal_8.4.3/sles_settings.php sites/default/settings.php
sudo httpd2 -k restart #sleep 10 sudo mysql -u drupal -pdrupal drupal < /home/test/work/Drupal_8.4.3/drupal.sql sleep 60s wget -q http://127.0.0.1:80/Drupal -O - | grep Welcome
